nodes.name: project
nodes.description: Any specifically defined piece of work that is undertaken or attempted to meet a single requirement. (NCIt C47885)

properties.name: availability_mechanism
properties.description: Mechanism by which the project will be made avilable.

properties.name: availability_type
properties.description: Is the project open or restricted?

properties.name: code
properties.description: Unique identifier for the project.

properties.name: date_collected
properties.description: The date or date range in which the project data was collected.

properties.name: dbgap_accession_number
properties.description: The dbgap accession number provided for the project.

properties.name: intended_release_date
properties.description: Tracks a Project's intended release date.

properties.name: investigator_affiliation
properties.description: The investigator's affiliation with respect to a research institution.

properties.name: investigator_name
properties.description: Name of the principal investigator for the project.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Display name/brief description for the project.

properties.name: releasable
properties.description: A project can only be released by the user when `releasable` is true.

properties.name: released
properties.description: To release a project is to tell the GDC to include all submitted entities in the next GDC index.

properties.name: support_id
properties.description: The ID of the source providing support/grant resources.

properties.name: support_source
properties.description: The name of source providing support/grant resources.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'project' table.

nodes.name: acknowledgement
nodes.description: Acknowledgement of an individual involved in a project.

properties.name: acknowledgee
properties.description: The indvidiual or group being acknowledged by the project.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'acknowledgement' table.

properties.name: acknowledgement.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'acknowledgement' table.

nodes.name: keyword
nodes.description: A keyword for a project.

properties.name: keyword_name
properties.description: The name of the keyword.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'keyword' table.

properties.name: keyword.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'keyword' table.

nodes.name: publication
nodes.description: Publication for a project.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'publication' table.

properties.name: publication.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'publication' table.

nodes.name: dataset
nodes.description: A coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing.

properties.name: associated_experiment
properties.description: The submitter_id for any experiment with which this experiment is associated, paired, or matched.

properties.name: copy_numbers_identified
properties.description: Are copy number variations identified in this experiment?

properties.name: data_description
properties.description: Brief description of the data being provided for this experiment.

properties.name: experimental_description
properties.description: A brief description of the experiment being performed.

properties.name: experimental_intent
properties.description: Summary of the goals the experiment is designed to discover.

properties.name: indels_identified
properties.description: Are indels identified in this experiment?

properties.name: marker_panel_description
properties.description: Brief description of the marker panel used in this experiment.

properties.name: number_experimental_group
properties.description: The number denoting this experiment's place within the group within the whole.

properties.name: number_samples_per_experimental_group
properties.description: The number of samples contained within this experimental group.

properties.name: somatic_mutations_identified
properties.description: Are somatic mutations identified for this experiment?

properties.name: type_of_data
properties.description: Is the data raw or processed?

properties.name: type_of_sample
properties.description: String indicator identifying the types of samples as contrived or clinical.

properties.name: type_of_specimen
properties.description: Broad description of the specimens used in the experiment.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'dataset' table.

properties.name: dataset.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'dataset' table.

nodes.name: case
nodes.description: The collection of all data related to a specific subject in the context of a specific experiment.

properties.name: disease_type
properties.description: Name of the disease for the case.

properties.name: primary_site
properties.description: Primary site for the case.

properties.name: dataset.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'dataset' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'case' table.

properties.name: case.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'case' table.

nodes.name: experimental_metadata
nodes.description: Data file containing the metadata for the experiment performed.

properties.name: data_category
properties.description: Broad categorization of the contents of the data file.

properties.name: data_format
properties.description: Format of the data files.

properties.name: data_type
properties.description: Specific content type of the data file.

properties.name: file_name
properties.description: The name (or part of a name) of a file (of any type).

properties.name: file_size
properties.description: The size of the data file (object) in bytes.

properties.name: md5sum
properties.description: The 128-bit hash value expressed as a 32 digit hexadecimal number used as a file's digital fingerprint.

properties.name: object_id
properties.description: The GUID of the object in the index service.

properties.name: dataset.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'dataset' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'experimental_metadata' table.

properties.name: experimental_metadata.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'experimental_metadata' table.

nodes.name: demographic
nodes.description: Data for the characterization of the patient by means of segementing the population (e.g., characterization by age, sex, or race).

properties.name: ethnicity
properties.description: An individual's self-described social and cultural grouping, specifically whether an individual describes themselves as Hispanic or Latino. The provided values are based on the categories defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Business and used by the U.S. Census Bureau.

properties.name: gender
properties.description: Text designations that identify gender. Gender is described as the assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles. [Explanatory Comment 1: Identification of gender is based upon self-report and may come from a form, questionnaire, interview, etc.]

properties.name: race
properties.description: An arbitrary classification of a taxonomic group that is a division of a species. It usually arises as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species and is characterized by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in the case of humans, by common history, nationality, or geographic distribution. The provided values are based on the categories defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Business and used by the U.S. Census Bureau.

properties.name: year_of_birth
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the calendar year in which an individual was born.

properties.name: year_of_death
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the year of the death of an individual.

properties.name: case.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'case' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'demographic' table.

properties.name: demographic.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'demographic' table.

nodes.name: diagnosis
nodes.description: Data from the investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

properties.name: age_at_diagnosis
properties.description: Age at the time of diagnosis expressed in number of days since birth.

properties.name: ajcc_clinical_m
properties.description: Extent of the distant metastasis for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined prior to treatment.

properties.name: ajcc_clinical_n
properties.description: Extent of the regional lymph node involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined prior to treatment.

properties.name: ajcc_clinical_stage
properties.description: Stage group determined from clinical information on the tumor (T), regional node (N) and metastases (M) and by grouping cases with similar prognosis for cancer.

properties.name: ajcc_clinical_t
properties.description: Extent of the primary cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined prior to treatment.

properties.name: ajcc_pathologic_m
properties.description: Code to represent the defined absence or presence of distant spread or metastases (M) to locations via vascular channels or lymphatics beyond the regional lymph nodes, using criteria established by the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC).

properties.name: ajcc_pathologic_n
properties.description: The codes that represent the stage of cancer based on the nodes present (N stage) according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

properties.name: ajcc_pathologic_stage
properties.description: The extent of a cancer, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body based on AJCC staging criteria.

properties.name: ajcc_pathologic_t
properties.description: Code of pathological T (primary tumor) to define the size or contiguous extension of the primary tumor (T), using staging criteria from the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC).

properties.name: ann_arbor_b_symptoms
properties.description: Text term to signify whether lymphoma B-symptoms are present as noted in the patient's medical record.

properties.name: ann_arbor_clinical_stage
properties.description: The classification of the clinically confirmed anatomic disease extent of lymphoma (Hodgkin's and Non-Hodgkins) based on the Ann Arbor Staging System.

properties.name: ann_arbor_extranodal_involvement
properties.description: Indicator that identifies whether a patient with malignant lymphoma has lymphomatous involvement of an extranodal site.

properties.name: ann_arbor_pathologic_stage
properties.description: The classification of the pathologically confirmed anatomic disease extent of lymphoma (Hodgkin's and Non-Hodgkins) based on the Ann Arbor Staging System.

properties.name: burkitt_lymphoma_clinical_variant
properties.description: Burkitt's lymphoma categorization based on clinical features that differ from other forms of the same disease.

properties.name: cause_of_death
properties.description: Text term to identify the cause of death for a patient.

properties.name: circumferential_resection_margin
properties.description: A value in millimeters indicating the measured length between a malignant lesion of the colon or rectum and the nearest radial (or circumferential) border of tissue removed during cancer surgery.

properties.name: classification_of_tumor
properties.description: Text that describes the kind of disease present in the tumor specimen as related to a specific timepoint.

properties.name: colon_polyps_history
properties.description: Yes/No indicator to describe if the subject had a previous history of colon polyps as noted in the history/physical or previous endoscopic report (s).

properties.name: days_to_birth
properties.description: Time interval from a person's date of birth to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated negative number of days.

properties.name: days_to_death
properties.description: Time interval from a person's date of death to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

properties.name: days_to_hiv_diagnosis
properties.description: Time interval from the date of the initial pathologic diagnosis to the date of human immunodeficiency diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

properties.name: days_to_last_follow_up
properties.description: Time interval from the date of last follow up to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

properties.name: days_to_last_known_disease_status
properties.description: Time interval from the date of last follow up to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

properties.name: days_to_new_event
properties.description: Time interval from the date of new tumor event including progression, recurrence and new primary malignacies to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

properties.name: days_to_recurrence
properties.description: Time interval from the date of new tumor event including progression, recurrence and new primary malignancies to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

properties.name: figo_stage
properties.description: The extent of a cervical or endometrial cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body, as described by the International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics (FIGO) stages.

properties.name: hiv_positive
properties.description: Text term to signify whether a physician has diagnosed HIV infection in a patient.

properties.name: hpv_positive_type
properties.description: Text classification to represent the strain or type of human papillomavirus identified in an individual.

properties.name: hpv_status
properties.description: The findings of the oncogenic HPV.

properties.name: last_known_disease_status
properties.description: Text term that describes the last known state or condition of an individual's neoplasm.

properties.name: laterality
properties.description: For tumors in paired organs, designates the side on which the cancer originates.

properties.name: ldh_level_at_diagnosis
properties.description: The 2 decimal place numeric laboratory value measured, assigned or computed related to the assessment of lactate dehydrogenase in a specimen.

properties.name: ldh_normal_range_upper
properties.description: The top value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for lactate dehydrogenase (units not specified).

properties.name: lymph_nodes_positive
properties.description: The number of lymph nodes involved with disease as determined by pathologic examination.

properties.name: lymphatic_invasion_present
properties.description: A yes/no indicator to ask if small or thin-walled vessel invasion is present, indicating lymphatic involvement

properties.name: method_of_diagnosis
properties.description: The method used to initially the patient's diagnosis.

properties.name: morphology
properties.description: The third edition of the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, published in 2000 used principally in tumor and cancer registries for coding the site (topography) and the histology (morphology) of neoplasms. The study of the structure of the cells and their arrangement to constitute tissues and, finally, the association among these to form organs. In pathology, the microscopic process of identifying normal and abnormal morphologic characteristics in tissues, by employing various cytochemical and immunocytochemical stains. A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

properties.name: new_event_anatomic_site
properties.description: Text term to specify the anatomic location of the return of tumor after treatment.

properties.name: new_event_type
properties.description: Text term to identify a new tumor event.

properties.name: perineural_invasion_present
properties.description: a yes/no indicator to ask if perineural invasion or infiltration of tumor or cancer is present.

properties.name: primary_diagnosis
properties.description: Text term for the structural pattern of cancer cells used to define a microscopic diagnosis.

properties.name: prior_malignancy
properties.description: Text term to describe the patient's history of prior cancer diagnosis and the spatial location of any previous cancer occurrence.

properties.name: prior_treatment
properties.description: A yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to the administration of therapeutic agents received before the body specimen was collected.

properties.name: progression_or_recurrence
properties.description: Yes/No/Unknown indicator to identify whether a patient has had a new tumor event after initial treatment.

properties.name: residual_disease
properties.description: Text terms to describe the status of a tissue margin following surgical resection.

properties.name: site_of_resection_or_biopsy
properties.description: The third edition of the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, published in 2000, used principally in tumor and cancer registries for coding the site (topography) and the histology (morphology) of neoplasms. The description of an anatomical region or of a body part. Named locations of, or within, the body. A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

properties.name: tissue_or_organ_of_origin
properties.description: Text term that describes the anatomic site of the tumor or disease.

properties.name: tumor_grade
properties.description: Numeric value to express the degree of abnormality of cancer cells, a measure of differentiation and aggressiveness.

properties.name: tumor_stage
properties.description: The extent of a cancer in the body. Staging is usually based on the size of the tumor, whether lymph nodes contain cancer, and whether the cancer has spread from the original site to other parts of the body. The accepted values for tumor_stage depend on the tumor site, type, and accepted staging system. These items should accompany the tumor_stage value as associated metadata.

properties.name: vascular_invasion_present
properties.description: The yes/no indicator to ask if large vessel or venous invasion was detected by surgery or presence in a tumor specimen.

properties.name: vital_status
properties.description: The survival state of the person registered on the protocol.

properties.name: year_of_diagnosis
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the year of an individual's initial pathologic diagnosis of cancer.

properties.name: case.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'case' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'diagnosis' table.

properties.name: diagnosis.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'diagnosis' table.

nodes.name: exposure
nodes.description: Clinically relevant patient information not immediately resulting from genetic predispositions.

properties.name: alcohol_history
properties.description: A response to a question that asks whether the participant has consumed at least 12 drinks of any kind of alcoholic beverage in their lifetime.

properties.name: alcohol_intensity
properties.description: Category to describe the patient's current level of alcohol use as self-reported by the patient.

properties.name: bmi
properties.description: The body mass divided by the square of the body height expressed in units of kg/m^2.

properties.name: cigarettes_per_day
properties.description: The average number of cigarettes smoked per day.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the patient in centimeters.

properties.name: pack_years_smoked
properties.description: Numeric computed value to represent lifetime tobacco exposure defined as number of cigarettes smoked per day x number of years smoked divided by 20.

properties.name: tobacco_smoking_onset_year
properties.description: The year in which the participant began smoking.

properties.name: tobacco_smoking_quit_year
properties.description: The year in which the participant quit smoking.

properties.name: tobacco_smoking_status
properties.description: Category describing current smoking status and smoking history as self-reported by a patient.

properties.name: weight
properties.description: The weight of the patient measured in kilograms.

properties.name: years_smoked
properties.description: Numeric value (or unknown) to represent the number of years a person has been smoking.

properties.name: case.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'case' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'exposure' table.

properties.name: exposure.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'exposure' table.

nodes.name: family_history
nodes.description: Record of a patient's background regarding cancer events of blood relatives.

properties.name: relationship_age_at_diagnosis
properties.description: The age (in years) when the patient's relative was first diagnosed.

properties.name: relationship_gender
properties.description: Text designations that identify gender. Gender is described as the assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles. [Explanatory Comment 1: Identification of gender is based upon self-report and may come from a form, questionnaire, interview, etc.]

properties.name: relationship_primary_diagnosis
properties.description: Text term for the structural pattern of cancer cells used to define a microscopic diagnosis.

properties.name: relationship_type
properties.description: The subgroup that describes the state of connectedness between members of the unit of society organized around kinship ties.

properties.name: relative_with_cancer_history
properties.description: Indicator to signify whether or not an individual's biological relative has been diagnosed with another type of cancer.

properties.name: case.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'case' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'family_history' table.

properties.name: family_history.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'family_history' table.

nodes.name: clinical_test
nodes.description: Metadata concerning any clinical tests used in relation to a case diagnosis.

properties.name: biomarker_name
properties.description: The name of the biomarker being tested for this specimen and set of test results.

properties.name: biomarker_result
properties.description: Text term to define the results of genetic testing.

properties.name: biomarker_test_method
properties.description: Text descriptor of a molecular analysis method used for an individual.

properties.name: cea_level_preoperative
properties.description: Numeric value of the Carcinoembryonic antigen or CEA at the time before surgery. [Manually- curated]

properties.name: dlco_ref_predictive_percent
properties.description: The value, as a percentage of predicted lung volume, measuring the amount of carbon monoxide detected in a patient's lungs.

properties.name: estrogen_receptor_percent_positive_ihc
properties.description: Classification to represent ER Positive results expressed as a percentage value.

properties.name: estrogen_receptor_result_ihc
properties.description: Text term to represent the overall result of Estrogen Receptor (ER) testing.

properties.name: fev1_fvc_post_bronch_percent
properties.description: Percentage value to represent result of Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (FEV1) divided by the Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) post-bronchodilator.

properties.name: fev1_fvc_pre_bronch_percent
properties.description: Percentage value to represent result of Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (FEV1) divided by the Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) pre-bronchodilator.

properties.name: fev1_ref_post_bronch_percent
properties.description: The percentage comparison to a normal value reference range of the volume of air that a patient can forcibly exhale from the lungs in one second post-bronchodilator.

properties.name: fev1_ref_pre_bronch_percent
properties.description: The percentage comparison to a normal value reference range of the volume of air that a patient can forcibly exhale from the lungs in one second pre-bronchodilator.

properties.name: her2_erbb2_percent_positive_ihc
properties.description: Classification to represent the number of positive HER2/ERBB2 cells in a specimen or sample.

properties.name: her2_erbb2_result_fish
properties.description: the type of outcome for HER2 as determined by an in situ hybridization (ISH) assay.

properties.name: her2_erbb2_result_ihc
properties.description: Text term to signify the result of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood or tissue for HER2 by histochemical localization of immunoreactive substances using labeled antibodies as reagents.

properties.name: ldh_level_at_diagnosis
properties.description: The 2 decimal place numeric laboratory value measured, assigned or computed related to the assessment of lactate dehydrogenase in a specimen.

properties.name: ldh_normal_range_upper
properties.description: The top value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for lactate dehydrogenase (units not specified).

properties.name: microsatellite_instability_abnormal
properties.description: The yes/no indicator to signify the status of a tumor for microsatellite instability.

properties.name: progesterone_receptor_percent_positive_ihc
properties.description: Classification to represent Progesterone Receptor Positive results expressed as a percentage value.

properties.name: progesterone_receptor_result_ihc
properties.description: Text term to represent the overall result of Progresterone Receptor (PR) testing.

properties.name: case.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'case' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'clinical_test' table.

properties.name: diagnosis.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'diagnosis' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'clinical_test' table.

properties.name: clinical_test.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'clinical_test' table.

nodes.name: sample
nodes.description: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

properties.name: biospecimen_anatomic_site
properties.description: Text term that represents the name of the primary disease site of the submitted tumor sample.

properties.name: composition
properties.description: Text term that represents the cellular composition of the sample.

properties.name: current_weight
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the current weight of the sample, measured  in milligrams.

properties.name: days_to_collection
properties.description: Time interval from the date of biospecimen collection to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

properties.name: days_to_sample_procurement
properties.description: The number of days from the date the patient was diagnosed to the date of the procedure that produced the sample.

properties.name: diagnosis_pathologically_confirmed
properties.description: The histologic description of tissue or cells confirmed by a pathology review of frozen or formalin fixed slide(s) completed after the diagnostic pathology review of the tumor sample used to extract analyte(s).

properties.name: freezing_method
properties.description: Text term that represents the method used for freezing the sample.

properties.name: initial_weight
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the initial weight of the sample, measured in milligrams.

properties.name: intermediate_dimension
properties.description: Intermediate dimension of the sample, in millimeters.

properties.name: is_ffpe
properties.description: Indicator to signify whether or not the tissue sample was fixed in formalin and embedded in paraffin (FFPE).

properties.name: longest_dimension
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the longest dimension of the sample, measured in millimeters.

properties.name: method_of_sample_procurement
properties.description: The method used to procure the sample used to extract analyte(s).

properties.name: oct_embedded
properties.description: Indicator of whether or not the sample was embedded in Optimal Cutting Temperature (OCT) compound.

properties.name: preservation_method
properties.description: Text term that represents the method used to preserve the sample.

properties.name: sample_type
properties.description: Characterization of the sample as either clinical or contrived.

properties.name: sample_type_id
properties.description: The accompanying sample type id for the sample type.

properties.name: sample_volume
properties.description: The volume of the sample in mL.

properties.name: shortest_dimension
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the shortest dimension of the sample, measured in millimeters.

properties.name: time_between_clamping_and_freezing
properties.description: Numeric representation of the elapsed time between the surgical clamping of blood supply and freezing of the sample, measured in minutes.

properties.name: time_between_excision_and_freezing
properties.description: Numeric representation of the elapsed time between the excision and freezing of the sample, measured in minutes.

properties.name: tissue_type
properties.description: Text term that represents a description of the kind of tissue collected with respect to disease status or proximity to tumor tissue.

properties.name: tumor_code
properties.description: Diagnostic tumor code of the tissue sample source.

properties.name: tumor_code_id
properties.description: BCR-defined id code for the tumor sample.

properties.name: tumor_descriptor
properties.description: Text that describes the kind of disease present in the tumor specimen as related to a specific timepoint.

properties.name: case.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'case' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'sample' table.

properties.name: diagnosis.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'diagnosis' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'sample' table.

properties.name: sample.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'sample' table.

nodes.name: treatment
nodes.description: Record of the administration and intention of therapeutic agents provided to a patient to alter the course of a pathologic process.

properties.name: days_to_treatment
properties.description: Number of days from date of initial pathologic diagnosis that treatment began.

properties.name: days_to_treatment_end
properties.description: Time interval from the date of the initial pathologic diagnosis to the date of treatment end, represented as a calculated number of days.

properties.name: days_to_treatment_start
properties.description: Time interval from the date of the initial pathologic diagnosis to the start of treatment, represented as a calculated number of days.

properties.name: therapeutic_agents
properties.description: Text identification of the individual agent(s) used as part of a prior treatment regimen.

properties.name: treatment_anatomic_site
properties.description: The anatomic site or field targeted by a treatment regimen or single agent therapy.

properties.name: treatment_intent_type
properties.description: Text term to identify the reason for the administration of a treatment regimen. [Manually-curated]

properties.name: treatment_or_therapy
properties.description: A yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to the administration of therapeutic agents received before the body specimen was collected.

properties.name: treatment_outcome
properties.description: Text term that describes the patient¿s final outcome after the treatment was administered.

properties.name: treatment_type
properties.description: Text term that describes the kind of treatment administered.

properties.name: diagnosis.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'diagnosis' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'treatment' table.

properties.name: treatment.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'treatment' table.

nodes.name: aliquot
nodes.description: Pertaining to a portion of the whole; any one of two or more samples of something, of the same volume or weight.

properties.name: aliquot_quantity
properties.description: The quantity in micrograms (ug) of the aliquot(s) derived from the analyte(s) shipped for sequencing and characterization.

properties.name: aliquot_volume
properties.description: The volume in microliters (ml) of the aliquot(s) derived from the analyte(s) shipped for sequencing and characterization.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Weight in grams or volume in mL.

properties.name: analyte_type
properties.description: Text term that represents the kind of molecular specimen analyte.

properties.name: analyte_type_id
properties.description: A single letter code used to identify a type of molecular analyte.

properties.name: concentration
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the concentration of an analyte or aliquot extracted from the sample or sample portion, measured in milligrams per milliliter.

properties.name: source_center
properties.description: Name of the center that provided the item.

properties.name: sample.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'sample' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'aliquot' table.

properties.name: aliquot.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'aliquot' table.

nodes.name: slide
nodes.description: A digital image, microscopic or otherwise, of any sample, portion, or sub-part thereof. (GDC)

properties.name: apoptotic_concentration
properties.description: The concentration, in cells/mL, of apoptotic cells in the slide blood.

properties.name: ctc_concentration
properties.description: The concentration, in cells/mL, of traditional CTC cells (intact and enlarged cell and nucleus, cytokeratin positive, and CD45 negative) in the slide blood.

properties.name: ctc_low_concentration
properties.description: The concentration, in cells/mL, of CTC-low cells (those with low cytokeratin levels compared to traditional CTCs) in the slide blood.

properties.name: ctc_small_concentration
properties.description: The concentration, in cells/mL, of CTC-small cells (those with a small nuclear and cellular size relative to traditional CTCs) in the slide blood.

properties.name: methanol_added
properties.description: True/False indicator for if methanol was used in the slide preparation process.

properties.name: number_nucleated_cells
properties.description: The total number of nucleated cells identified on the slide.

properties.name: number_proliferating_cells
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the count of proliferating cells determined during pathologic review of the sample slide(s).

properties.name: percent_eosinophil_infiltration
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of infiltration by eosinophils in a tumor sample or specimen.

properties.name: percent_granulocyte_infiltration
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of infiltration by granulocytes in a tumor sample or specimen.

properties.name: percent_inflam_infiltration
properties.description: Numeric value to represent local response to cellular injury, marked by capillary dilatation, edema and leukocyte infiltration; clinically, inflammation is manifest by reddness, heat, pain, swelling and loss of function, with the need to heal damaged tissue.

properties.name: percent_lymphocyte_infiltration
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of infiltration by lymphocytes in a solid tissue normal sample or specimen.

properties.name: percent_monocyte_infiltration
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of monocyte infiltration in a sample or specimen.

properties.name: percent_necrosis
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of cell death in a malignant tumor sample or specimen.

properties.name: percent_neutrophil_infiltration
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of infiltration by neutrophils in a tumor sample or specimen.

properties.name: percent_normal_cells
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of normal cell content in a malignant tumor sample or specimen.

properties.name: percent_stromal_cells
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of reactive cells that are present in a malignant tumor sample or specimen but are not malignant such as fibroblasts, vascular structures, etc.

properties.name: percent_tumor_cells
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the percentage of infiltration by granulocytes in a sample.

properties.name: percent_tumor_nuclei
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of tumor nuclei in a malignant neoplasm sample or specimen.

properties.name: run_datetime
properties.description: A combination of date and time of day in the form [-]CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm]

properties.name: run_name
properties.description: Name, number, or other identifier given to this slide's run.

properties.name: section_location
properties.description: Tissue source of the slide.

properties.name: slide_identifier
properties.description: Unique identifier given to the this slide.

properties.name: sample.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'sample' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'slide' table.

properties.name: slide.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'slide' table.

nodes.name: read_group
nodes.description: Sequencing reads from one lane of an NGS experiment.

properties.name: RIN
properties.description: A numerical assessment of the integrity of RNA based on the entire electrophoretic trace of the RNA sample including the presence or absence of degradation products.

properties.name: adapter_name
properties.description: Name of the sequencing adapter.

properties.name: adapter_sequence
properties.description: Base sequence of the sequencing adapter.

properties.name: barcoding_applied
properties.description: True/False: was barcoding applied?

properties.name: base_caller_name
properties.description: Name of the base caller.

properties.name: base_caller_version
properties.description: Version of the base caller.

properties.name: experiment_name
properties.description: Submitter-defined name for the experiment.

properties.name: flow_cell_barcode
properties.description: Flow Cell Barcode.

properties.name: includes_spike_ins
properties.description: Spike-in included?

properties.name: instrument_model
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the sample dimension that is greater than the shortest dimension and less than the longest dimension, measured in millimeters.

properties.name: is_paired_end
properties.description: Are the reads paired end?

properties.name: library_name
properties.description: Name of the library.

properties.description: Catalog of Library Preparation Kit

properties.description: Name of Library Preparation Kit

properties.description: Vendor of Library Preparation Kit

properties.name: library_preparation_kit_version
properties.description: Version of Library Preparation Kit

properties.name: library_selection
properties.description: Library Selection Method

properties.name: library_strand
properties.description: Library stranded-ness.

properties.name: library_strategy
properties.description: Library strategy.

properties.name: platform
properties.description: Name of the platform used to obtain data.

properties.name: read_group_name
properties.description: Read Group Name

properties.name: read_length
properties.description: The length of the reads.

properties.name: sequencing_center
properties.description: Name of the center that provided the sequence files.

properties.name: sequencing_date
properties.description: A combination of date and time of day in the form [-]CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm]

properties.name: size_selection_range
properties.description: Range of size selection.

properties.name: spike_ins_concentration
properties.description: Spike in concentration.

properties.description: Name of the FASTA file that contains the spike-in sequences.

nodes.name: slide_count
nodes.description: Information pertaining to processed results obtained from slides; often in the form of counts.

properties.name: biomarker_signal
properties.description: Numeric quantification of the biomarker signal.

properties.name: cell_count
properties.description: Raw count of a particular cell type.

properties.name: cell_identifier
properties.description: An alternative identifier for a given cell type.

properties.name: cell_type
properties.description: The type of cell being counted or measured.

properties.name: ck_signal
properties.description: Numeric quantification of the CK signal.

properties.name: er_localization
properties.description: Cellular localization of the endoplasmic reticulum as determined by staining.

properties.name: frame_identifier
properties.description: Name, number, or other identifier given to the frame of the slide from which this image was taken.

properties.name: relative_cytokeratin_intensity
properties.description: The ratio of the single cell's cytokeratin staining intensity to the average of the surrounding cells.

properties.name: relative_er_intensity
properties.description: The ratio of the single cell's endoplasmic reticulum staining intensity to the average of the surrounding cells.

properties.name: relative_nuclear_intensity
properties.description: The ratio of the single cell's nuclear staining intensity to the average of the surrounding cells.

properties.name: relative_nuclear_size
properties.description: The ratio of the single cell's nucleus size to the average of the surrounding cells.

properties.name: run_name
properties.description: The name or identifier given to the run that was used to generate this slide count.

nodes.name: submitted_methylation
nodes.description: DNA methylation data files contain information on raw and normalized signal intensities, detection confidence and calculated beta values for methylated and unmethylated probes. properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: encoding
properties.description: Version of ASCII encoding of quality values found in the file.

properties.description: The name (or part of a name) of a file (of any type).

properties.name: kmer_content
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: overrepresented_sequences
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: total_aligned_reads
properties.description: The total number of reads with at least one reported alignment.

properties.name: total_sequences
properties.description: A count of the total number of sequences processed.
